name: 楊士萱
schedule:
1.Introduction and Foundations (Chapter 1, 3 weeks)
2.Groups and Vector Spaces (Chapter 2, 1 week)
3.Linear Block Codes (Chapter 3, 2 weeks) 
4.Cyclic codes (Chapter 4, 2 weeks) Lab 2, Lab 3
(Midterm Exam)
5.Number Theory and Modern Algebra (Chapter 5, 2 weeks) Lab 5
6.BCH and Reed-Solomon Codes (Chapter 6, 3 weeks) Lab 7
7.Convolutional Codes (Chapter 12, 2 weeks) Lab 9, Lab 10
8.Turbo Codes (Chapter 14, 1 weeks)
(Final Exam)
scorePolicy:
1.Writing assignments, 20%.
2.Programming assignments, 30% (with code review).
3.MidTerm exam, 20%.
4.Final exam, 30%.
materials:
1.Error Control Coding second edition by S. Lin and D. J. Costello, Jr., Pearson Educational Inc., 2004.
2.The Art of Error Correcting Coding by R. H. Morelos-Zaragoza, John Wiley & Sons, 2002. (Web site: the-art-of-ecc.com, containing programs written in C language)
3.Error-Control Coding for Data Networks by I. S. Reed and X. Chen, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1999. (Good source for RS codes)
4.Turbo Coding by C. Heegard and S. B. Wicker, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1999.
5.Convolutional Coding: Fundamentals and Applications by C. Lee, Artech House Inc., 1997.
6.資料壓縮，戴顯權編著，紳藍出版社。
